title: Oceanic Collegiate Championship

embed.description: In collaboration with uni clubs across the Oceanic region, Remyrhe Gaming is proud to announce the Oceanic Collegiate Championship (OCC), a semesterly tournament for university teams in Oceania. The tournament will run over the academic calendar semester and is comprised of 3 stages.

body:
Hey guys,

In collaboration with uni clubs across the Oceanic region, Remyrhe Gaming is proud to announce the Oceanic Collegiate Championship, a semesterly tournament for university teams in Oceania. 

The qualifiers are already underway in many states. For those of you who still want to compete this semester, this is your last chance to sign up!

The following regions are are still accepting last-minute signups:

WA: Send a message to info@remyrhegaming.com expressing your interest in playing. The cutoff date is the 26th of April.
NZ: More details can be found [here](http://remyrhegaming.com/events/occ-nz-qualifier/). Alternatively, you can message us at info@remyrhegaming.com. The cutoff date is the 24th of April.

Come support the players as they battle it out in the group stages. The top 2 teams will be flown to Riot’s studio in Sydney to compete for the title of the best uni team in OCE.

replies.body: I'm really looking forward to this! I only wish Uni-eSports had exited when I was at UWS!
